snippet.title: Solar Panic: Utter Distress Official Trailer
snippet.description:
In SPUD you follow a true story that we made up and explore through three planets filled with funny and/or stupid encounters. Wield top-notch second-hand gadgets and meet weird and socially awkward characters as you stumble upon a SERIOUS mystery.


Solar Panic on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1195920/Solar_Panic_Utter_Distress/


Learn more about the game:

http://www.barracudadisaster.com/solarpanic/



And follow us on social media for more news and updates:


Twitter: https://twitter.com/BarracudaDis/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/barracudadisaster/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BarracudaDisaster/


Music by Davedondee / Pond5.com

Music by Mellowstu / Pond5.com
